string.value: #bSam#k in the Dangerous Forest is wondering where Maria is. Maybe you can help him...
Sam wants you to take care of some snails to help #bMaria#k, who wants to collect some mushrooms. Slay #r10 Snails#k, then tell Maria that the field is clear.\n\nSnail #r#a10371##k
You told Maria that you took care of the snails.
흐음... 마리아는 잘 하고 있을까...? 아, 여행자님. 안녕하세요? 지금 혹시 달팽이사냥터를 가로질러 동쪽으로 가고 계신가요? 그렇다면 부탁 하나만 들어주시지 않겠어요?
암허스트에 사는 마리아가 버섯을 따러 이 근처로 오기로 했는데 통 오질 않네요. 아무래도 달팽이들이 무서워서 움직이지 못하는 것 같아요.
그러니 당신께서 가는 길에 달팽이 10마리만 퇴치해 주시면 안 될까요? 달팽이를 퇴치한 후 마리아에게 걱정하지 말고 움직이라는 말까지 전해 주시면 감사하겠습니다.
I wonder where Maria is... Oh, hello traveler! Are you, by any chance, heading east? If so, can you do me a favor?

Maria, who lives in Amherst, promised to pick mushrooms with me, but she still isn't here. I have a hunch it's because of her fear of #rSnails#k. She's probably paralyzed in terror by the mere thought of them!
Could you please hunt #r10 Snails#k, so she can walk here without fear? Afterwards, please notify #bMaria#k and let her know it's safe.
You can reach Amherst by traveling east. Also, you can check the World Map by pressing the #bW key#k.
Hmmm... Defeat #r10 Snails#k, then keep heading right until you see Maria.
Hmmm? Are you here on Sam's behalf? Then please hunt #r10 Snails#k first then talk to me.
